mdRecord.dcterms:title: Wawona Road, general view
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Wilson, Richard Guy [photographer]
mdRecord.dcterms:publisher: Rector and Visitors of the University of Virginia
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Wawona Road originated as a series of trails, 1855. Galen Clark purchased land and settled in the area ca. 1857 and constructed a toll crossing over the South Fork of the Merced River He explored a series of trails which became parts of the Wawona Road. -- http://www.gribblenation.org/2018/02/history-of-wawona-road-yosemite.html [work]
rebuilt by the National Park Service, 1933 [work]
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Architecture and City Planning
Garden and Landscape
national parks
Yosemite National Park (Calif.)
natural landscapes
Clark, Galen (Canadian outdoorsman and author, 1814-1910, active in the United States)
mdRecord.dcterms:spatial: Yosemite National Park, Mariposa, California, United States
